about_the_game:
Have you ever heard of a game called Billiards? It's basically pool- with a fancy name. Have you ever thought, “Wow, I wish there was a faster and more intense version?” Well look no farther, because Battle Billiards is the game you’re looking for!

In this game both players go at the same time! No turns, no waiting, and most importantly, you can sabotage your friends. What are you waiting for? Cue up and get rolling! With 19 different personalities to play as, you and a friend can battle cue to cue in a fast-paced fight to the finish!

No friends? No problem! Play solo in freeplay mode, or challenge the AI in a fast paced 3 stage Tournament to unlock new characters! There are even 5 different kinds of tables to play on- how cool is that?
